summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Order Fulfillment timer, tracking, and KPI system. All 21 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend timer components are fully functional with Start/Pause/Resume/Stop operations working correctly. Timer banner displays user stats and live timer. Minor HTML nesting issue fixed.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/fulfillment/stages/{stage_id}/start-timer - starts timer correctly (200)
Backend: POST /api/fulfillment/stages/{stage_id}/stop-timer - stops timer with duration and counts (200)
Backend: POST /api/fulfillment/stages/{stage_id}/pause-timer - pauses timer and accumulates time (200)
Backend: POST /api/fulfillment/stages/{stage_id}/resume-timer - resumes paused timer (200)
Backend: GET /api/fulfillment/user/active-timer - returns active timer or empty array (200)
Backend: GET /api/fulfillment/stages/{stage_id}/active-workers - returns list of active workers (200)
Backend: GET /api/fulfillment/stats/user-kpis - returns user KPIs aggregated by stage (200)
Backend: GET /api/fulfillment/stats/stage-kpis - returns stage KPIs by user (200)
Backend: Timer enforcement - only one timer allowed per user at a time (400 on second start)
Backend: Invalid stage returns 404
Backend: Pause/Resume/Stop without active timer returns 400
Frontend: FulfillmentTimerBanner component appears when user has active timer
Frontend: Start Timer button appears in each fulfillment stage tab (Orders, Print List, Mount List, Finish, Pack and Ship)
Frontend: User stats shown in timer banner (Time, Orders, Avg/hr)
Frontend: Pause button pauses timer and shows PAUSED badge
Frontend: Resume button resumes paused timer
Frontend: Stop button stops timer and removes banner
Frontend: Toast notifications for timer actions (started, paused, resumed, stopped)
Frontend: Active workers badge shows next to Start Timer button
Frontend: Live timer counter updates in real-time
Frontend: Stage tabs navigation works correctly
critical_code_review_comments:
Fixed: HTML nesting issue in FulfillmentTimerBanner.jsx - Badge (div) was nested inside

tag, changed to

wrapper
seed_data_creation: Created test user and session for fulfillment timer testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fulfillment timer system is fully functional. Test user session created with token 'test_fulfillment_session_1769931244846'. All timer endpoints work correctly: start, stop, pause, resume. KPI endpoints return aggregated stats. Frontend components integrated and working. Minor HTML fix applied to FulfillmentTimerBanner.jsx.
